alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Linn; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:21AM CDT until June 17 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Linn County in north central Missouri... Eastern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Eastern Mercer County in north central Missouri... Western Putnam County in north central Missouri... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 121 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Princeton, or 18 miles northwest of Milan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milan, Princeton, Green City, Galt, Laredo, Newtown, Humphreys, Pollock, Lucerne, Harris, Powersville, Osgood, Mill Grove, Reger and Lemons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
